system.descriptionText:
1. Contaminated Environs (100xp): +3 Toughness or +3 Willpower, -3 Fellowship. Gain Peer (Mutants) and Resistance (Poisons). For add. 100xp, roll for 1 mutation (reroll 75+).
2. False-Man (300xp): Gain Ambidextrous, Autosanguine, and Chem-Geld Talents, Increase two characteristics by +3 and reduce one by -3. Gain 2d10 Insanity or -1 Fate Point.
3. Warp Tainted (200xp): +3 Perception or +3 Willpower, -3 Fellowship. Gain Dark Soul + Jaded talents and Untrained Forbidden Lore (Warp) skill. +1d10 Corruption. for +300xp gain Favoured by the Warp Talent and +1d10 Corruption.
